_meta.description: Skills de l'Artisan. Glue support - utility master qui aide l'équipe. Hybride ATK/MAG selon subclass.
_meta.scaling_note: Damage: base_power + scaling_percent% ATK. Heals/Shields: base + scaling_percent% MAG.
_meta.class_mechanic: Teamwork bonus - several skills reward positioning near allies

base_skills.description_fr: Frappe d'outil (18 + 50% ATK). +10% dégâts par allié adjacent (max +40%).
base_skills.description_en: Tool strike (18 + 50% ATK). +10% damage per adjacent ally (max +40%).

base_skills.description_fr: Réparation rapide: heal (40 + 50% MAG) sur cible + shields (15 + 25% MAG) en croix (6s).
base_skills.description_en: Quick patch: heal (40 + 50% MAG) on target + shields (15 + 25% MAG) in cross (6s).

base_skills.description_fr: Rythme de travail: +20% atk speed sur row_3 allies pendant 10s.
base_skills.description_en: Work rhythm: +20% atk speed on row_3 allies for 10s.

base_skills.description_fr: Expose un défaut: -20% Flat DR (8s) + équipe inflige +10% dégâts à la cible.
base_skills.description_en: Expose flaw: -20% Flat DR (8s) + team deals +10% damage to target.

base_skills.description_fr: Partage de ressources: restore (25 + 30% MAG) mana aux alliés en zone 2x3.
base_skills.description_en: Resource share: restores (25 + 30% MAG) mana to allies in 2x3 zone.

blacksmith.identity: Armor Breaker + Boss Shredder + ATK-based shields

skills.description_fr: Coup de marteau (28 + 70% ATK). +25% dégâts si cible a -Flat DR debuff.
skills.description_en: Hammer strike (28 + 70% ATK). +25% damage if target has -Flat DR debuff.

skills.description_fr: Enfonce l'armure (15 + 40% ATK). -25% armor (10s), peut stacker 2x.
skills.description_en: Dents armor (15 + 40% ATK). -25% armor (10s), can stack 2x.

skills.description_fr: Balayage (18 + 45% ATK) row_3. -15% armor sur toutes les cibles (8s).
skills.description_en: Sweeping strike (18 + 45% ATK) row_3. -15% armor on all targets (8s).

skills.description_fr: Forge un bouclier (25 + 50% ATK) + +15% Flat DR (8s). Scale avec ATK du forgeron.
skills.description_en: Forges a shield (25 + 50% ATK) + +15% Flat DR (8s). Scales with blacksmith ATK.

skills.description_fr: SIGNATURE - Enclume (40 + 90% ATK) zone 2x2. Stun 2s. Double dégâts si cibles ont -armor.
skills.description_en: SIGNATURE - Anvil (40 + 90% ATK) 2x2 zone. Stun 2s. Double damage if targets have -armor.

skills.description_fr:
Érige un mur de boucliers forgés protégeant 2 alliés en colonne.
Accorde un bouclier de 30 (+55% ATK) pendant 8s.
skills.description_en:
Steel rises as a bulwark.
Erects a wall of forged shields protecting 2 allies in a column.
Grants a 30 (+55% ATK) shield for 8s.

skills.description_fr:
Plaques renforcées, joints rivés.
Augmente l'armure d'un allié de 30% pendant 12s.
skills.description_en:
Reinforced plates, riveted joints.
Increases an ally's armor by 30% for 12s.

skills.description_fr:
L'eau de trempe apaise les brûlures.
Soigne la cible et 1 allié adjacent de 35 (+45% ATK).
Retire les altérations de feu.
skills.description_en:
The quenching water soothes the burns.
Heals the target and 1 adjacent ally for 35 (+45% ATK).
Removes fire-based effects.

skills.description_fr:
Hérissée de pointes d'acier trempé.
Accorde un bouclier de 25 (+50% ATK) à un allié pendant 8s.
Renvoie 20% des dégâts reçus aux attaquants.
skills.description_en:
Bristling with tempered steel spikes.
Grants a 25 (+50% ATK) shield to an ally for 8s.
Reflects 20% of damage taken back to attackers.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Le métal prend vie autour des alliés.
Accorde un bouclier de 50 (+80% ATK) en zone 2x3 pendant 6s.
Confère l'immunité aux altérations de contrôle pendant 5s.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. Metal comes alive around allies.
Grants a 50 (+80% ATK) shield in a 2x3 area for 6s.
Grants CC immunity for 5s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 32 (+75% ATK) dégâts physiques à une cible.
Réduit l'armure de 20% pendant 8s.
+30% dégâts contre les boss et élites.
skills.description_en:
Shatters matter down to its structure.
Deals 32 (+75% ATK) physical damage to one target.
Reduces armor by 20% for 8s.
+30% damage against bosses and elites.

skills.description_fr:
Expose les faiblesses de la cible.
Tous les alliés infligent +25% dégâts à la cible exposée pendant 8s.
skills.description_en:
Every armor has its flaw.
Exposes the target's weaknesses.
All allies deal +25% damage to the exposed target for 8s.

skills.description_fr:
Écrase 2 ennemis en colonne.
Inflige 25 (+60% ATK) dégâts physiques.
skills.description_en:
A vertical strike that cleaves the line.
Deals 25 (+60% ATK) physical damage to 2 enemies in a column.

skills.description_fr:
Marque une cible ennemie pendant 10s.
Le prochain coup critique sur la cible inflige +50% dégâts bonus.
skills.description_en:
The smith identifies the fracture.
Marks a target for 10s.
The next critical hit on the target deals +50% bonus damage.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Inflige 45 (+100% ATK) dégâts physiques à la cible et 2 ennemis adjacents.
Détruit tous les boucliers sur les cibles touchées.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. Where steel yields, everything collapses.
Deals 45 (+100% ATK) physical damage to the target and 2 adjacent enemies.
Destroys all shields on hit targets.

alchemist.identity: Toxin Stacker + AOE DoT pressure + Detonate burst
alchemist.dot_note: Toxin is Alchemist-specific, different from Poison (Rogue), Bleed (physical), Burn (magical)

skills.description_fr: Fiole toxique (12 + 35% MAG) row_2. Applique 2 stacks Toxin.
skills.description_en: Toxic flask (12 + 35% MAG) row_2. Applies 2 Toxin stacks.

skills.description_fr: Nuage corrosif (10 + 30% MAG) zone 2x2. 1 Toxin stack + -15% armor (10s).
skills.description_en: Corrosive cloud (10 + 30% MAG) 2x2 zone. 1 Toxin stack + -15% armor (10s).

skills.description_fr: Fumées affaiblissantes (8 + 25% MAG) row_3. 1 Toxin stack + -20% ATK (8s).
skills.description_en: Weakening fumes (8 + 25% MAG) row_3. 1 Toxin stack + -20% ATK (8s).

skills.description_fr: Explosion toxique (14 + 40% MAG) croix. Applique 2 Toxin stacks.
skills.description_en: Toxic burst (14 + 40% MAG) cross. Applies 2 Toxin stacks.

skills.description_fr: SIGNATURE - Catalyse zone 2x3. Detonate tous les Toxin: (15 + 30% MAG) par stack. Consomme les stacks.
skills.description_en: SIGNATURE - Catalyze 2x3 zone. Detonates all Toxin: (15 + 30% MAG) per stack. Consumes stacks.

plague_brewer.identity: DoT stacking + soft control + attrition wins

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 10 (+30% MAG) dégâts magiques.
Applique 3 charges de Toxine pendant 10s.
Se propage aux ennemis adjacents si la cible meurt.
skills.description_en:
A particularly tenacious strain.
Deals 10 (+30% MAG) magic damage.
Applies 3 Toxin stacks for 10s.
Spreads to adjacent enemies if the target dies.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 12 (+35% MAG) dégâts magiques à 4 ennemis en ligne complète.
Applique 2 charges de Toxine pendant 8s.
skills.description_en:
The infection spreads along the line.
Deals 12 (+35% MAG) magic damage to 4 enemies in a full row.
Applies 2 Toxin stacks for 8s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 8 (+25% MAG) dégâts magiques.
Réduit les soins reçus par la cible de 50% pendant 8s.
skills.description_en:
Tissues slowly necrotize.
Deals 8 (+25% MAG) magic damage.
Reduces healing received by the target by 50% for 8s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 10 (+30% MAG) dégâts magiques en zone 2x2.
Applique 1 charge de Toxine, ralentit de 25% et réduit l'ATK de 15% pendant 6s.
skills.description_en:
A fetid fog invades the field.
Deals 10 (+30% MAG) magic damage in a 2x2 area.
Applies 1 Toxin stack, slows by 25% and reduces ATK by 15% for 6s.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Fait exploser toutes les charges de Toxine sur la cible et les ennemis autour.
15 (+40% MAG) + 25 dégâts par charge consommée.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. All infections reach their peak.
Detonates all Toxin stacks on the target and surrounding enemies.
15 (+40% MAG) + 25 damage per stack consumed.

reactionist.identity: Detonation windows + conditional burst + chain reactions

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 14 (+35% MAG) dégâts magiques.
Applique une marque explosive pendant 8s.
Explose pour 40 dégâts bonus si la cible est frappée par une autre attaque.
skills.description_en:
Mixes volatile reagents.
Deals 14 (+35% MAG) magic damage.
Applies an explosive mark for 8s.
Detonates for 40 bonus damage if the target is hit by another attack.

skills.description_fr: Inflige 22 (+50% MAG) dégâts magiques à la cible et 1 ennemi adjacent.
skills.description_en:
Pressure reaches its breaking point.
Deals 22 (+50% MAG) magic damage to the target and 1 adjacent enemy.

skills.description_fr:
Applique une marque réactive pendant 10s.
Explose pour 30% des dégâts de base si la cible lance un sort.
skills.description_en:
A catalyst waiting for the right moment.
Applies a reactive mark for 10s.
Detonates for 30% base damage if the target casts a spell.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 18 (+45% MAG) dégâts magiques.
Fait exploser toutes les marques actives sur le champ de bataille.
skills.description_en:
The time for reaction has come.
Deals 18 (+45% MAG) magic damage.
Detonates all active marks on the battlefield.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Inflige 28 (+65% MAG) dégâts magiques rebondissant sur 3 cibles.
Chaque rebond inflige +15% dégâts.
Fait exploser toutes les marques au passage.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. The gears spin out of control.
Deals 28 (+65% MAG) magic damage bouncing to 3 targets.
Each bounce deals +15% more damage.
Detonates all marks on contact.

chef.identity: Battle Cook - Buffs + Regen (HoT flat) + Burn DPS AOE

skills.description_fr: Coupe brûlante (18 + 50% MAG) row_2. Applique 1 burn stack (5s).
skills.description_en: Searing slice (18 + 50% MAG) row_2. Applies 1 burn stack (5s).

skills.description_fr: Arôme brûlant (15 + 40% MAG) row_3. 2 burn stacks (6s) + -15% Flat DR.
skills.description_en: Blazing aroma (15 + 40% MAG) row_3. 2 burn stacks (6s) + -15% Flat DR.

skills.description_fr: En-cas énergétique row_2. +15% ATK + +15% atk speed (10s).
skills.description_en: Energy snack row_2. +15% ATK + +15% atk speed (10s).

skills.description_fr: Bouillon réconfortant row_3. HoT (8 + 20% MAG)/s + +15% Flat DR (10s).
skills.description_en: Warming broth row_3. HoT (8 + 20% MAG)/s + +15% Flat DR (10s).

skills.description_fr: SIGNATURE - Festin infernal rect_2x3. Ennemis: (35 + 75% MAG) + 3 burn. Alliés: HoT (10 + 25% MAG)/s + +20% dmg (10s).
skills.description_en: SIGNATURE - Inferno feast rect_2x3. Enemies: (35 + 75% MAG) + 3 burn. Allies: HoT (10 + 25% MAG)/s + +20% dmg (10s).

skills.description_fr: Confère +30% ATK et +15% chances de critique à un allié pendant 12s.
skills.description_en:
A secret recipe that multiplies strength.
Grants +30% ATK and +15% critical chance to an ally for 12s.

skills.description_fr: Applique un soin continu de 12 (+25% MAG) par seconde à 3 alliés en ligne pendant 12s.
skills.description_en:
A dish simmered with patience.
Applies a heal over time of 12 (+25% MAG) per second to 3 allies in a row for 12s.

skills.description_fr: Soigne de 25 (+35% MAG) et purifie les altérations négatives de la cible et d'1 allié adjacent.
skills.description_en:
Good spices drive out ailments.
Heals for 25 (+35% MAG) and purifies negative effects from the target and 1 adjacent ally.

skills.description_fr:
Soigne un allié de 80 (+60% MAG).
Utilisable uniquement si l'allié est en dessous de 30% HP.
skills.description_en:
Never leave the table hungry.
Heals an ally for 80 (+60% MAG).
Can only be used if the ally is below 30% HP.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Soigne de 60 (+70% MAG) tous les alliés en zone 2x3.
Confère +25% vitesse d'attaque pendant 8s.
Purifie toutes les altérations négatives.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. The service is impeccable.
Heals all allies in a 2x3 area for 60 (+70% MAG).
Grants +25% attack speed for 8s.
Purifies all negative effects.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 22 (+55% MAG) dégâts magiques à une cible.
Applique 2 charges de brûlure pendant 6s.
skills.description_en:
A blade seasoned with crushed pepper.
Deals 22 (+55% MAG) magic damage to one target.
Applies 2 burn stacks for 6s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 16 (+40% MAG) dégâts magiques à 3 ennemis en ligne.
Applique 2 charges de brûlure pendant 6s.
skills.description_en:
Cooking aromas invade the field.
Deals 16 (+40% MAG) magic damage to 3 enemies in a row.
Applies 2 burn stacks for 6s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 20 (+50% MAG) dégâts magiques.
Étourdit la cible pendant 1.5s.
skills.description_en:
Concentrated pepper shot to the face.
Deals 20 (+50% MAG) magic damage.
Stuns the target for 1.5s.

skills.description_fr:
Surchauffe la cible.
Augmente les dégâts de feu reçus de 50% pendant 8s.
skills.description_en:
Temperature rises beyond the critical threshold.
Overheats the target.
Increases fire damage taken by 50% for 8s.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Inflige 30 (+65% MAG) dégâts magiques en zone 2x2.
Fait exploser toutes les charges de brûlure : +20 dégâts par charge consommée.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. The main course is served.
Deals 30 (+65% MAG) magic damage in a 2x2 area.
Detonates all burn stacks: +20 damage per stack consumed.

musician.identity: Tempo Controller + Team Buffs + Debuff Disruption

skills.description_fr: Hymne de bataille row_3. +20% ATK (10s).
skills.description_en: Battle hymn row_3. +20% ATK (10s).

skills.description_fr: Accord dissonant (14 + 35% MAG) row_3. -20% accuracy + -15% atk speed (6s).
skills.description_en: Dissonant chord (14 + 35% MAG) row_3. -20% accuracy + -15% atk speed (6s).

skills.description_fr: Changement de tempo: +20% atk speed sur tous les alliés (8s).
skills.description_en: Tempo shift: +20% atk speed on all allies (8s).

skills.description_fr: Vers inspirant row_2. HoT (6 + 15% MAG)/s + +10% crit (10s).
skills.description_en: Inspiring verse row_2. HoT (6 + 15% MAG)/s + +10% crit (10s).

skills.description_fr: SIGNATURE - Performance grandiose. Alliés: +15% all stats. Ennemis: -15% all stats (12s).
skills.description_en: SIGNATURE - Grand performance. Allies: +15% all stats. Enemies: -15% all stats (12s).

bard.identity: Classic support anchor + anti-CC team window

skills.description_fr: Confère +20% ATK et +15% chances de critique à tous les alliés pendant 10s.
skills.description_en:
The notes resonate in every heart.
Grants +20% ATK and +15% critical chance to all allies for 10s.

skills.description_fr: Purifie toutes les altérations négatives de 3 alliés en ligne.
skills.description_en:
A crystal-clear voice that dispels all ills.
Purifies all negative effects from 3 allies in a row.

skills.description_fr: Applique un soin continu de 10 (+25% MAG) par seconde à 2 alliés en colonne pendant 12s.
skills.description_en:
A soothing tune played gently.
Applies a heal over time of 10 (+25% MAG) per second to 2 allies in a column for 12s.

skills.description_fr:
Soigne un allié de 50 (+55% MAG) et confère +20% réduction de dégâts pendant 8s.
Utilisable uniquement si l'allié est en dessous de 40% HP.
skills.description_en:
A verse that refuses to let go.
Heals an ally for 50 (+55% MAG) and grants +20% damage reduction for 8s.
Can only be used if the ally is below 40% HP.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Soigne tous les alliés de 40 (+50% MAG).
Confère l'immunité aux altérations de contrôle pendant 5s.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. Every instrument finds its place.
Heals all allies for 40 (+50% MAG).
Grants CC immunity for 5s.

drummer.identity: DPS pressure + mark windows + signature slam

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 28 (+65% ATK) dégâts physiques à une cible.
Étourdit l'ennemi pendant 1.5s.
skills.description_en:
The drum thunders like a cannon.
Deals 28 (+65% ATK) physical damage to one target.
Stuns the enemy for 1.5s.

skills.description_fr: Inflige 20 (+50% ATK) dégâts physiques à 3 ennemis en ligne.
skills.description_en:
A drumroll that sweeps the line.
Deals 20 (+50% ATK) physical damage to 3 enemies in a row.

skills.description_fr: Inflige 24 (+55% ATK) dégâts physiques à la cible et 2 ennemis adjacents.
skills.description_en:
The vibration propagates through the ground.
Deals 24 (+55% ATK) physical damage to the target and 2 adjacent enemies.

skills.description_fr:
Marque un ennemi pendant 8s.
Les prochaines attaques contre la cible infligent +20% dégâts.
skills.description_en:
The rhythm marks the prey.
Marks an enemy for 8s.
All attacks against the target deal +20% damage.

skills.description_fr:
Sort signature. Inflige 42 (+90% ATK) dégâts physiques en zone 2x2.
Étourdit tous les ennemis touchés pendant 2s.
skills.description_en:
Signature skill. The final solo that shakes the earth.
Deals 42 (+90% ATK) physical damage in a 2x2 area.
Stuns all enemies hit for 2s.
